title: Rav Zevadia Cohen Threats
body: Police investigate death threats against Rav Zevadia Cohen, who's running for Tel Aviv chief rabbi, after anonymous individuals demanded he step back from the candidacy.

title: Satmar Rebbe Condemns Draft
body: Satmar Rebbe Rav Aharon Teitelbaum denounced the proposed draft legislation, warning it would "take part in the destruction of half of the Jewish people." The Rebbe spoke at a reception in Yerushalayim, criticizing the Bismuth draft plan.
